means: 防止，避免( avert的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He avoids any eye contact, quickly averting his gaze when anyone approaches.
sentence.Network_cn: 他避免任何眼神接触，一有人靠近就把目光迅速移开。

sentence.Network_en: The margin of time for averting crisis was melting away.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以用来消弥这一危机的些许时光正在逝去.

sentence.Network_en: These results underscore the value of rescue medications in averting psychotic relapse.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些结果显示了救护性治疗对避免精神病复发的价值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Their actions precipitated the war averting it ., 他们的行为促使战争爆发而不是避免战争.
intelligent in advance warning message system for averting pylon collision ., 桥墩防撞智能预警报警系统设计.

the nightmare vision of Athens being repeated around the continent should not happen ; but averting it will require more bravery and honesty than Europe's leaders have shown so far .在欧洲大陆一再上演的希腊噩梦不应该发生，但是扭转颓势需要更多勇气和诚实，而目前欧洲领导人的表现还远远不够。

list.abs: Blog of You to Work ... 164、脊线（ Ridge lines） 166、风险厌恶者（ Risk averter） 167、风险爱好者（ Risk lover）.
autoradiograph 放射自显影片averted dose 可避免剂量-
risk assessment 风险评估risk averter 避免承担风险risk bearing 风险负担
BBC news 21 Mar 2013 flashcards | Quizlet ... censorship 审查制度；审查机构 to avert 避免 | 挡开 bankruptcy 破产.

entry.def: If you avert something unpleasant, you prevent it from happening.

example.ex: Talks with the teachers' union over the weekend have averted a strike...
example.tran: 周末与教师工会举行的谈判避免了一场罢工。

example.ex: A fresh tragedy was narrowly averted yesterday.
example.tran: 昨天险些酿成一场新的悲剧。

entry.def: If you avert your eyes or gaze from someone or something, you look away from them.

example.ex: He avoids any eye contact, quickly averting his gaze when anyone approaches...
example.tran: 他避免任何眼神接触，一有人靠近就把目光迅速移开。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of preventing something from occurring;
2. the act of turning yourself (or your gaze) away;

sentences.sentence: "averting her gaze meant that she was angry"

auth_sentence.content: And from that hideous man Averting, to Ocellopan he turn'd.
auth_sentence.res_content: And from that hideous man Averting, to Ocellopan he turn'd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And from that hideous man Averting, to Ocellopan he turn'd.

auth_sentence.content: Still, there are costs to averting our eyes from the realities.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, there are costs to averting our eyes from the realities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, there are costs to averting our eyes from the realities.

auth_sentence.content: European countries and Iranian negotiators have succeeded in averting a breakdown in negotiations.
auth_sentence.res_content: European countries and Iranian negotiators have succeeded in averting a breakdown in negotiations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: European countries and Iranian negotiators have succeeded in averting a breakdown in negotiations.
